description:
A collab to celebrate the 13 years that KEEN has supported Leave No Trace and its commitment to a sustainable future for the planet. 3% of sale proceeds go to Leave No Trace to continue this legacy partnership. Traditional all-leather construction with modern perks like waterproof-breathable membranes that keep water out, but let your feet breathe. The Pyrenees are built to keep your feet comfortable over long hiking days and rough miles.

  • Uppers are waterproof leather and Keen.Dry™ waterproof-breathable membrane
  • Removable metatomical dual-density EVA footbed
  • Midsoles are polyurethane with full-length stability shanks
  • Outsoles are dual compound 4mm multi-directional lugs
name: Keen Pyrenees Waterproof Hiking Boots - Men's
